header_title_one_key: Infinity is an ERP system that supports the Arabic language for managing gold and jewelry stores. It supports the application of the first phase of issuing the electronic invoice, in its two forms, the tax invoice and the simplified tax invoice.  And you can follow up on the general sales of products and gold jewelry by piece and weight in addition to following up the sales of each seller separately, following up your stock of products, displaying stock value reports and inventory reports, and issuing profit and loss reports to know how well your business is performing each period of time.
features_title_one_key: Fully Manage, Your Gold and Jewellery Stores' Financial Accounting
features_details_one_one_key: Manage your store accounts, track sales and calculate profits
features_details_one_two_key: Issue sale and purchase invoices, including taxes and financial discounts
features_details_one_three_key: Track product sales, record revenues and store expenses, then calculate the net profits for each specific period of time
features_title_two_key: Monitor vendors and store employees performance
features_details_two_one_key: Assign employees and vendors and keep track of their activity records
features_details_two_two_key: Advanced reports informing you of the extent of performance of each employee and vendor according to the powers assigned to him
features_details_two_three_key: Reports showing sales achieved by each seller separately
features_details_three_one_key: Calculate the net income for each period through the profit and loss report
features_details_three_two_key: View sales reports by items to learn about the best-selling jewellery and gold jewellery
features_details_three_three_key: Make a periodic inventory of your stock of products through the inventory report. You can also benefit from many other reports that cover all aspects of your business.
features_details_three_four_key: Follow up the daily reports that are created automatically for any financial operations or procedures that take place inside the store
features_details_three_fife_key: A complete network of accounts displaying all balances of the store's accounts with all movements within each account
features_details_three_six_key: Final accounting reports determining the financial position of the shop at the end of the year.
features_details_four_three_key: Choose the right module for you, whether it is gold by weight, gold by piece or diamond by piece, add your company logo. also you can freely adjust the site's colours and identity to match your brand identity
